mapper.select: SELECT a.*,GROUP_CONCAT(b.`code`) as monitor_codes FROM pap_t_landpage a LEFT JOIN pap_t_landpage_code b ON a.id = b.landpage_id GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY a.update_time DESC
SELECT a.*,GROUP_CONCAT(b.`code`) as monitor_codes FROM pap_t_landpage a LEFT JOIN pap_t_landpage_code b ON a.id = b.landpage_id GROUP BY a.id HAVING a.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
